column5: My place is close to Galveston and 45 minutes to Houston, restaurants and dining. Youâ€™ll love my place because of It on 7 acres with a guest cottage. Has lots of trees and on dead end street. Very private. Pool and room off pool for cards. 2 fireplaces, the outdoors space, the ambiance. My place is good for couples, families (with kids), and big groups.
